entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 97.1 kPa
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
